Title: Requires racetrack locations awarded a gaming facility license maintain live racing activity
Summary: Requires racetrack locations awarded a gaming facility license maintain live racing activity.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to requiring racetrack locations awarded a gaming facility license maintain live racing activity
